item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。投资者在等待美国的 CPI，美元兑欧元跌至 1 月份以来的最低点，而英国的通胀给英格兰银行带来了提振。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Investors await US CPI, the dollar weakens to the lowest since January against the euro and UK inflation gives the Bank of England a boost. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 市场等待伊朗报复，石油期权活动跃升
item.description: 在市场为伊朗可能对以色列发动袭击做好准备之际，石油交易商们正重返期权合约，以规避价格飙升的风险。【原文：Oil traders are returning to options contracts to hedge against the risk of a price spike as markets brace for a possible Iranian attack on Israel.】

item.title: 依靠出口，荷兰经济以两年来最快速度增长
item.description: 荷兰第二季度经济增长超过预期，增速为两年来最快。【原文：The Dutch economy grew more than anticipated in the second quarter, expanding at the fastest pace in two years.】

item.title: 对冲基金争相将 ChatGPT 从实习生变为分析师
item.description: 克里斯-普尔曼（Chris Pulman）曾花两天时间准备央行会议的预告。现在，这位 Balyasny 资产管理公司的首席经济学家只需花上 30 分钟即可完成。【原文：Chris Pulman used to spend two days prepping previews for central bank meetings. Now it can take the chief economist at Balyasny Asset Management as little as 30 minutes.】

item.title: 伦敦房价一年多来首次年度上涨
item.description: 伦敦的房价在一年多的时间里首次出现上涨，这表明伦敦的房地产市场开始摆脱利率上调的影响。【原文：House prices in London rose for the first time in more than a year, a sign that its property market is beginning to shake off the impact of higher interest rates.】

item.title: 印度金属巨头 Hindalco 将于 2025 年尝试 Novelis IPO
item.description: 推迟了 Novelis 公司首次公开募股的 Hindalco Industries Ltd. 表示，正在为其美国子公司寻求溢价估值，任何上市尝试都将在 2025 年进行。【原文：Hindalco Industries Ltd., which delayed an initial public offering for Novelis Inc., said it’s seeking a premium valuation for its US unit and any attempt to list it will take place in 2025.】

item.title: 俄罗斯企业发现数十亿美元因付款延迟而滞留国外
item.description: 由于美国的二次金融制裁威胁导致国际贸易结算日益拖延，俄罗斯企业今年在国外积压的现金数量大幅增加。【原文：Russian businesses saw a massive jump this year in the amount of cash piling up abroad as the threat of secondary financial sanctions from the US causes increasing delays in international trade settlements.】

item.title: 债券 ETF 赎回增加，中国监管机构警告利率风险
item.description: 中国最高金融监管机构警告资产管理公司注意利率风险，因为在当局采取行动抑制买方兴趣后，国内债券投资基金的赎回速度加快。【原文：China’s top financial regulator warned asset management firms about interest rate risks, as redemptions from domestic bond investment funds quickened following authorities’ moves to tame buyer interest.】

item.title: 押注美联储降息速度将快于欧洲央行，欧元逼近年内高点
item.description: 由于预计美联储未来几个月的降息幅度将超过欧洲央行，欧元兑美元汇率升至今年以来的最高水平。【原文：The euro inched toward its highest level against the dollar this year, amid anticipation the Federal Reserve will cut interest-rates by more than the European Central Bank in the coming months.】

item.title: S.商业信心回升，敦促非洲促进增长
item.description: 南非商会在宣布过去两个月商业信心略有回升时说，南非新的多党政府有机会促进经济增长和投资。【原文：South Africa’s new multi-party government has an opportunity to boost economic growth and investment, the country’s Chamber of Commerce said, as it announced a slight recovery in business confidence over the last two months.】

item.title: 奋进号同意支付员工加班费以结束罢工
item.description: 奋进矿业公司（Endeavour Mining Plc）同意向塞内加尔萨博达拉矿的员工支付加班费，以结束为期五天的罢工，直至找到更长久的解决方案。【原文：Endeavour Mining Plc agreed to pay staff at its Sabodala mine in Senegal for overtime work to end a five-day strike until a more permanent solution is found.】

item.title: 莱茵金属与美国签订 9.5 亿美元国防协议，拓展美国业务
item.description: 德国莱茵金属公司（Rheinmetall AG）将以 9.5 亿美元的价格收购美国一家军用车辆专业公司，以扩大其在全球最大国防市场的地位。【原文：Rheinmetall AG is set to buy a US military vehicle specialist for $950 million as the German company seeks to expand its position in the world’s largest defense market.】

item.title: 南非、B4SA 将重点关注能源、货运和监管问题
item.description: 南非政府和南非商业协会（Business for South Africa）计划在未来一年内加快改革步伐。【原文：The South African government and Business for South Africa — a body that’s helping the state to coordinate efforts to fix the nation’s collapsing infrastructure and governance issues — plan to accelerate reforms over the next year.】

item.title: 欧元区就业增长放缓，预示未来困难重重
item.description: 由于经济疲软的迹象日益明显，整个欧元区的企业在第二季度都放缓了招聘步伐。【原文：Firms across the euro zone slowed hiring in the second quarter amid mounting signs of economic weakness.】

item.title: 韩国证券交易所称俄罗斯扩大影子舰队有助于抵御石油制裁
item.description: 据 KSE 研究所称，俄罗斯今年上半年努力加强其所谓的 "影子 "油轮船队，帮助抵消了西方制裁的影响。【原文：Russia’s efforts to bolster its so-called shadow fleet of oil tankers in the first half of this year helped to offset the impact of Western sanctions, according to the KSE Institute.】

item.title: KKR 正在洽谈 5 亿美元私人债务，为 FGS 交易提供资金
item.description: 知情人士透露，KKR & Co.正处于计划收购公共关系公司 FGS Global 的早期阶段，计划从私人信贷机构借贷约 5 亿美元的债务。【原文：KKR & Co. is in the early stages of plans to finance its acquisition of public relations firm FGS Global with about $500 million of debt from private credit lenders, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 印度七月贸易赤字因进口支出增加而扩大
item.description: 由于国内需求强劲导致国家进口支出增加，印度 7 月份的贸易赤字有所扩大。【原文：India’s trade deficit widened in July as strong domestic demand led to a rise in the nation’s import bill.】

item.title: 中国再次向债券买家发出严厉口头警告
item.description: 中国向债券投资者发出了迄今为止最直接的警告之一，在一系列挤压投机者的措施未能点燃持续的转机之后，中国重拾严厉的言辞来遏制收益率的下跌。【原文：China delivered one of its most direct warnings yet to bond investors, returning to harsh rhetoric to curb a fall in yields after a salvo of measures to squeeze speculators failed to ignite a sustained turnaround.】

item.title: 消息人士称，圣达国际正在考虑以 1 亿至 2 亿美元的价格在香港上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，主要在非洲供应个人护理产品的广州顺达国际贸易有限公司正在考虑在香港进行首次公开募股，可能会筹集到 1 亿至 2 亿美元的资金。【原文：Guangzhou Sunda International Trading Co., a supplier of personal care products mainly in Africa, is considering an initial public offering in Hong Kong that could raise $100 million to $200 million, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 债券交易员期待美国 CPI 支持半点降息押注
item.description: 已经为国债市场带来更多收益做好准备的投资者正在期待美国的通胀数据能够加强美联储加快降息步伐的理由。【原文：Investors who’ve positioned for even more gains in the Treasury market are looking for US inflation data that reinforces the case for a faster pace of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 阿斯利康市值首次突破 2000 亿英镑
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）成为首家估值超过 2,000 亿英镑（2,570 亿美元）的英国公司，此前该公司在抗癌药物上的豪赌推动了股价的上涨。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc has become the first British company to be valued at more than £200 billion ($257 billion) after a big bet on cancer drugs helped drive a rally in the shares.】

item.title: 中国恒力集团据称计划在香港首次公开募股造船部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国恒力集团正在考虑在香港为其造船部门进行首次公开募股。【原文：China’s Hengli Group is considering a Hong Kong initial public offering for its shipbuilding unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 挪威 17 亿美元基金因科技股大涨回报率达 8.6
item.description: 由于股市飙升，挪威 1.7 万亿美元的主权财富基金上半年回报率为 8.6%，即 1,380 亿美元。【原文：Norway’s $1.7 trillion sovereign wealth fund returned 8.6%, or $138 billion, in the first half as stocks surged.】

item.title: 瑞银集团埃尔莫蒂认为全球经济衰退后市场 "脆弱不堪
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）说，投资者应该注意上周的全球大跌，这是 "系统脆弱 "的迹象。【原文：UBS Group AG Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti said investors should heed last week’s global selloff as a sign of “fragility in the system.”】

item.title: 交易员全面预计英国央行今年将在 CPI 之后再降息两次
item.description: 在数据显示通胀加速度低于预期之后，交易员们加大了对英国央行今年降息的押注，完全预计将再降息两个季度。【原文：Traders added to bets on interest-rate cuts from the Bank of England this year, fully pricing two more quarter-point cuts, after data showed inflation accelerated less than forecast.】

item.title: 维斯塔斯发出盈利预警后风力涡轮机订单激增的信号
item.description: 维斯塔斯风能系统公司（Vestas Wind Systems A/S）在发布与另一部分业务相关的盈利预警两天后，报告风力涡轮机订单激增，试图让投资者放心。【原文：Vestas Wind Systems A/S sought to reassure investors as it reported a surge in orders for wind turbines two days after issuing a profit warning related to a different part of its business.】

item.title: 瑞典通胀数据令瑞典央行继续下调利率
item.description: 瑞典核心通胀率的下降幅度略低于预期，但这一数据不太可能动摇押注瑞典央行下周将降低借贷成本的市场。【原文：Sweden’s core inflation rate declined somewhat less than expected in a reading that is unlikely to sway markets that are betting on the central bank to lower borrowing costs next week.】

item.title: 英国通胀升幅低于预期，服务业降温
item.description: 英国的通货膨胀率今年首次回升，但仍低于经济学家和英格兰银行的预期水平，这为进一步放宽利率提供了支持。【原文：Britain’s inflation rate picked up for the first time this year but remained below the level economists and the Bank of England had expected, bolstering the case for a further loosening in interest rates.】

item.title: 英国通胀低于预期
item.description: 2024年8月13日星期二，英国伊普斯维奇，莫里森超市内的酒类报价牌。英格兰银行将利率从 16 年高点下调数日后公布的数据显示，英国食品杂货通胀率自 2023 年 3 月以来首次上升。摄影师：克里斯-拉特克利夫/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Price offer signs for alcohol inside a Morrisons supermarket in Ipswich, UK, on Tuesday, Aug. 13, 2024. UK grocery inflation rose for the first time since March 2023, according to data released days after the Bank of England cut interest rates from a 16-year high. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 中国商人因德龙倒闭而获贷款人支持
item.description: 一家卷入江苏德龙镍业股份有限公司倒闭风波的中国领先大宗商品贸易商已从银行获得价值超过 60 亿美元的信贷支持。【原文：A leading Chinese commodity trader embroiled in the collapse of Jiangsu Delong Nickel Industry Co. has won credit backing from banks worth over $6 billion.】
